about_the_game:
This DLC is meant for true fans and everyone who wants to support the Indie developer team behind "Indoorlands".

To give something back you'll get:

The right to bring your name into the game*

An exclusive entrance area statue

Access to artworks (for personal use only!)

Access to the game music (for personal use only!)

Enjoy our main game music and trailer music.


*After you activated the Supporter Edition you will be able to access the name entry form ingame by clicking "Supporter Edition" in the main menu. Please be aware that we'll add the names in batches and not immediately after you entered your name.
detailed_description:
This DLC is meant for true fans and everyone who wants to support the Indie developer team behind "Indoorlands".

To give something back you'll get:

The right to bring your name into the game*

An exclusive entrance area statue

Access to artworks (for personal use only!)

Access to the game music (for personal use only!)

Enjoy our main game music and trailer music.


*After you activated the Supporter Edition you will be able to access the name entry form ingame by clicking "Supporter Edition" in the main menu. Please be aware that we'll add the names in batches and not immediately after you entered your name.
